ygData.subject: RE: lambent quest-ion...hehehe
ygData.msgSnippet: Whenever any recipe in EverQuest calls for more than one of an item, you must give them to them separately, NOT stacked.  Cash is handled differently of course
ygData.messageBody:
Whenever any recipe in EverQuest calls for more than one of an item, you
must give them to them separately, NOT stacked. Cash is handled differently
of course (i.e. you don't give anyone one coin at a time).

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kevikazzam@... [mailto:Kevikazzam@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 11:00 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] lambent quest-ion...hehehe
>
>
> From: Kevikazzam@...
>
> Hail !
>
> My question regards getting the product of a lambent stone and a gem. For
> example if i want a Lambent star ruby i must give the NPC ( can't
> recall the
> name ) 2 star ruby's and a lambent stone. So my question is , do
> i give the
> rubies to him/her stacked ( only taking up 1 trade box ) or
> seperate ( using
> 2) ? Or does it even matter ? I just really have zero interest in
> screwing
> this up , any and all opinions are welcome .
>
